1: Goodness comes to those with pure hearts.
2: I keep my footing and walk forward with steady steps.
3: I celebrate others' prosperity with contentment
4: Strength remains firm to the end
5: Live in ease and enjoy strong health.
6: Humility surrounds all and kindness clothes lives
7: Abundance exceeds what the heart desires.
8: Speak humbly and uphold justice for all.
9: Speak wisely across the world, honoring higher values.
10: People gather and receive overflowing refreshment.
11: Universal wisdom fully knows and understands.
12: Wealth and prosperity increase in this world.
13: Clean hands and a pure heart bring lasting good.
14: Daily refinement strengthens character and deepens understanding.
15: I speak to honor and strengthen the community.
16: Seeking wisdom patiently leads to clear understanding.
17: Sacred contemplation yields clarity and wise understanding.
18: Solid footing keeps every step steady and secure.
19: Justice arrives swiftly, restoring balance and lasting peace.
20: Awakening reveals truth, dissolving illusions like dreams.
21: I welcome inner correction, and my wisdom increases.
22: I choose wisdom and understanding with humility
23: I stay close; your hand guides me continually.
24: Wise guidance leads to lasting honor.
25: I seek the highest good above all things.
26: Enduring strength fortifies the heart and satisfies forever.
27: Staying close and faithful brings lasting life and protection.
28: I stay close to God, trust, and proclaim God's works.
